name: Cave Story 3D
description:
Cave Story 3D is a side scrolling action adventure game inspired by the fan-favorite 2D original. Now in a full 3D world, Cave Story takes the proven 2D action and exploration into stereoscopic awesomeness.

You wake up in a cave with no idea who you are or where you came from, but you know you must help a cute race of rabbit-like creatures beat the crap out of some crusty old doctor. As you advance through the game, youâ€™ll learn the origin of the Mimiga world and even your own. Like the critically acclaimed Pixel masterpiece, Cave Story 3D is a combination of high-speed shooting action scenes with heavy emphasis on platforming, exploration, and light puzzle solving, as well as a deep storyline. Also you can experience the original indie hit with exclusive "paper" 2D pixel mode!
disclaimer:
Please use Parental Controls to restrict 3D access for children 6 and under.

You may need an additional compatible SD card or SDHC card with available space to download this software. Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
